transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Yeah, hi sir. Atul ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Yeah, hi Atul sir. Very good morning. Kaise hain aap?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Sir, main Sweety baat kar rahi thi Kunal ke manager. Aapka ek catalog hai na Shakti Printers and gifting karke?
Customer: Ji, mam, abhi hamari unse baat hui, unko humne bata rakha hai ki hamari ek part time job hai. Abhi hum is samay duty pe hi hain.
Executive: Okay. Koi problem nahi hai sir. Aap mujhe bataye ki main aapko kab tak connect kar sakti hu. Main hi connect karungi aapko. Aap bataye kab connect karu? 3 baje ke baad.
Customer: 3 baje ke baad. 3 baje ke baad.
Executive: Done, done sir. Main aapko 3 baje ke baad ek bar connect karti hu.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has a part-time job, currently on duty.



Resolution:

- Executive will connect after 3:00 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer after 3:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, follow up, part-time job
